title: Sender Manifest
description: Schema utilized for metadata that accompanies file uploads.

version.description: Denotes the sender manifest schema version; this value must equal '2.0'.

data_stream_id.description: Data stream identifier; the highest taxonomical designation for a given collection of data to be uploaded.

data_stream_route.description: Second level taxonomical designation for a given collection of data to be uploaded. This value is typically designated to reference a particular file format type.

sender_id.description: Identifier for the submitter of the data.

data_producer_id.description: Identifier for the producer of the submitted data.

jurisdiction.description: Geographical location of the submitted data.

received_filename.description: The name of the file uploaded by the sender.

custom_metadata_field_1.description: Optional custom metadata field example for string type.

custom_metadata_field_2.description: Optional custom metadata field example for array type.
